name: Space Typer (CieriusGames)
description:
Space Typer is a small project that is meant to be simple yet polished. Multiple updates are planned.

Play as a ship in space where typing the word above the enemy is how you attack.

Currently there are 3 game modes:

- Endless: It's just endless words.

- Timed: Last for the legnth of time.

- Word Count: Destroy that many words.

Known Issues:

- Not many words... they're coming! I promise!

- Score has no point... not yet it doesn't is all I can say.

Any comments or feedback is highly encouraged and appreciated!

Cheers, Kanin
